Name: The Italian Job No. 2
Ingredients: Top up with Shiraz red wine
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with wine and serve with straws.
Review: Mix layers with straw prior to drinking for vanillaed, almond, fruity wine.
History: Discovered in 2002 at Rapscallion, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Italian Job No. 2 contains 206 calories
